II. You are the son of Janaka to the 1st Assamese among us, and the brother of the 2nd and 3rd Assamese
. Out of our love and affection for you, and with the intention of giving you some property in return for love, without seeking any other reward from you, we hereby give you the property mentioned in the third paragraph below worth Rs. 8,66,000/- free of charge and transfer the said property to you on this very day. Therefore, you shall have full, exclusive, perpetual, complete and exclusive right to the said property, and shall enjoy it for the rest of your life, your children and grandchildren, by paying the taxes due to the Government, in a comfortable and prosperous manner. The property is our ancestral property, that is, the parents of the 1st respondent, after whom it was inherited by the 1st respondent's brothers, and they shared the property as a gift before 1983, and the income from the share of the 1st respondent has been our full rightful owner until today. No mortgages, guarantees, charges, etc. on the property 2. Malli Nagaraju Velu

I/We hereby certify that the title deed, EC, Aadhar card, PAN card etc., which they have provided to me/us in this document, have been fully examined and the immovable property shown by them has been handed over to the scribe along with the Aadhar card, PAN card and payment details related to me/us for the preparation of the document. The draft prepared by the scribe has been prepared in accordance with the matters stated by me/us in this document. I/We hereby declare that if any of the information provided herein is found to be false, neither the author of this document nor the staff of the Registration Department or the Registration Office shall be held responsible in any way for such false information and that I/We shall be liable for all legal proceedings taken against me/us. I/We hereby declare that if I/We are found to have contravened the provisions of Section 22B of the Registration Act, 1908, I/We shall be liable to the punishment specified in Section 82 of the Registration Act, 1908. I/We hereby declare that I/We have furnished the title deeds, e.c., Aadhar card, PAN card, photograph of the immovable property etc. to the undersigned for the purpose of preparing this document. Accordingly, this document has been prepared and issued in respect of the Scheduled Property in this document. I/We, my/our heirs, etc. hereby declare that the property in this deed has not been transferred to anyone. I/We hereby declare that if the above information is found to be false, the clerk who prepared this deed, the staff of the Registration Department and the Registrar's Office shall not be liable and shall be liable to me/us for the same. I/We hereby declare that the property described in this deed belongs to me/us only and that no alienation of the said property has been made to anyone before and that if I/we are found to have violated the provisions of Section 22B of the Registration Act, 1908, I/we shall be liable to the punishment mentioned in Section 82 of the Registration Act, 1908. I/We, my/our heirs, hereby give my consent to the following immovable property deed..

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No.354 of 2026 dated 30/Jan/2026, executed by 1. Malladi Ramudu, 2. Malladi Nagaraju , 3. Malladi Dora Babu in favour of Malladi Gangadhararao ( Where as The Donee is Son of 1st Donor & Brother of 2nd, 3rd Donor ) towards the property admeasuring an extent of 145.2 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 7-71 and Assessment Number  199903001055, comprised in survey number 122-3 situated in N. Kothapalli Village, Uppalaguptam Mandal, within the District of Konaseema registered at sub-registrar office Mummudivaram is bounded as follows:

North by: Passage Way 
South by: Site of Angadi Adinarayana 
East by: House of Malladi Lakshmana Swamy
West by: House of Malladi Suryanarayana

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 122-3, bearing house no.7-71, situated in N.Kothapalli measuring about 145.2 Sq. Yds., was originally owned by Malladi Ramudu , who acquired the property through Oral Partition before 1983 after Demise of their Parents. [Ref: Deed] 2. The aforementioned 1. Malladi Ramudu, 2. Malladi Nagaraju , 3. Malladi Dora Babu executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 30/Jan/2026 registered as document No. 354 of 2026 before the SRO Mummudivaram in favour of Malladi Gangadhararao (Where as The Donee is Son of 1st Donor & Brother of 2nd, 3rd Donor ) towards the property measuring 145.2 Sq. Yds., bearing house no.7-71 and Assessment Number 199903001055 , comprised in survey no.122-3, at N.Kothapalli. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1. The Property Tax Receipt No.06562273_35, dated 15/Feb/2025, imprinted by the Nimmakayala Kothapalle Grama Panchayath discloses that Malladi Ramudu has paid property tax towards house number 7-71 and Assessment Number (old) 1150 & 199903001055 (new). 2. The Property Demand Notice dated 15/Dec/2025 imprinted by the Nimmakayala Kothapalle Grama Panchayath discloses that Malladi Ramudu was demanded to clear the tax for the period 2025-2026 towards the property bearing assessment no.(old) 1150 & 199903001055 (new) . Note : As per demand notice if the property tax due is not paid within 15 days from the date of the demand notice, the property will be confiscated. Hence, it is, advisable to verify that the tax is paid up-to-date towards the schedule property.
The HTR attached discloses that Malladi Ramudu is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Malladi Gangadhararao.

contentList: Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Malladi Gangadhararao, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property admeasuring an extent of 145.2 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 7-71 and Assessment Number  199903001055, comprised in survey number 122-3 situated in N. Kothapalli Village, Uppalaguptam Mandal, within the District of Konaseema registered at sub-registrar office Mummudivaram.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
